attributes.action: Make the sale of fireworks for private/personal displays illegal in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Every year on bonfire night thousands of animals across the UK go into complete shock, some even becoming paralysed with fear at the sound of fireworks, 
The psychological effects it has on animals is so severe its caused death and has been dubbed 'firework fright'. 

Aside from the horrific stress it puts animals through in the weeks surrounding bonfire night approximately 1000 people enter A&E with firework related injurys,with over 500 of them being children.
Fireworks need to be monitored
attributes.background: Stop the sale of fire works in the UK for personal/ private use, allowing fireworks to only be displayed at public events for bonfire night

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
